description: Bellum Gallicum; Bellum Civile; Bellum Alexrinum; Bellum Africanum; Bellum Hispaniense; Attributed to Francesco di Antonio del Chierico (Italian, 1433 - 1484), and Gaius Julius Caesar (Roman, 100 - 44 B.C.), and Nicolo di Antonio di Pardo de Ricci (Nicolaus Riccius Spinosus) (Italian, about 1434/1435 - about 1490), et al; Florence, Tuscany, Italy; 1460 to 1470; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with parchment; Leaf: 32.7 × 23 cm (12 7/8 × 9 1/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 8; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
